name: side-nav
description: Off-canvas slide-in/out navigation tray with controversial hamburger :p Written in ES6 JavaScript with zero libraries so I can learn JS properly instead of being a jQuery hack forever.

scripts.build: node-sass --output-style=compact src/css/style.scss dist/css/style.css && copyfiles -u 2 src/js/bundle.js dist/js && copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.html dist

author: thomasxbanks
